name: Arbroath Smokie Kedgeree With Grilled Haddock & Grain Mustard Cream Sauce
recipeInstructions: 1. Sweat onion and garlic in half the butter. • Add rice and sweat for 2 minutes.• Add wine and stock bit by bit.
3. Simmer for 15 minutes or so, until liquid is absorbed and rice is cooked.
4. Add flaked Smokies, then add rest of butter, cream, Parmesan and dill.
5. Stir until all combined and butter melted.
7. Place cream, stock, lemon juice and mustard in pan.
8. Bring to boil and reduce until coats the back of a spoon, season to taste.
9. Place portion of haddock on tray, season with salt, drizzle with fresh squeezed lemon juice, place knob of butter on top. Grill until just cooked.
11. Spoon kedgeree onto centre of plate, place grilled haddock on top, top with soft poached egg and drizzle mustard cream sauce over the top and around plate.
